summary: Made to Break Skulls like Nuts
descriptionHtml:
There are many Types of the Mace in Skyrim but I have always wanted a Mace like a Sword, Also Called a \"BAR MACE\" So I made one myself and I like to Share it with you . Well here it is - This is a Real Medieval Weapon and was used in the Middle Age to kill and it Breaks Skulls easily. Hope you like it !

The Original Stats from the Creation Kit are : 

Critical Damage 8
Damage 20
Damage per Second 16


These Stats are individual and depend on your Characters Perks and Skills ! For me it makes 60 Damage because my Perks and Skills are at the Maximum ! So dont compare the Stats from the Screenshots to yours ! 

You can craft it at any Forge in the Iron Section.. No DLC needed !

Endorsments are Welcome ! Thank you *

Credits to Nexus and Bethesda !

Enjoy
author: HXP
